actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to transfer responsibility for furnishing certified copies of Miller Act payment bonds from the Comptroller General to the officer that awarded the contract for which the bond was given.

summary.text: Transfers responsibility for furnishing certified copies of Miller Act payment bonds from the Comptroller General to the department secretary or agency head of the contracting agency that awarded the public contract for which the bond was given.

titles.title: A bill to transfer responsibility for furnishing certified copies of Miller Act payment bonds from the Comptroller General to the officer that awarded the contract for which the bond was given.
